Title: Code Jumper
Description: Code-Jumper allows you to navigate your code by displaying a map of your declarations on the side panel of your editor.
HomeWiki:
Code Jumper is a project I hacked together in a week to provide a free alternative to code navigation inside Visual Studio.

Current features are:

  • Parsing of C#, VB, C/C++, C/C++ CLI
  • Basic refactoring: Rename
  • Themable via XAML configuration
